featured.text: In recent years, the soybean has been used in making many different foods and has become the atom of health food.

definition.zh_def: 原子是物質的基本單位，由質子、中子和電子組成。
definition.en_def: An atom is the basic unit of matter, consisting of protons, neutrons, and electrons.
definition.example: Everything around us is made up of atoms.
